sequences.text: Tu peux maintenant créer des UGC super réalistes comme moi

description.text: A user types "A woman in the kitchen, holding a water glass" into the prompt field of the "Create avatar" modal.
A user reviews options in the "Create avatar" modal, hovering over the "Selfie" button, then activating the "Upscale" toggle, and finally positioning the cursor over the "Start generation" button.
The "Start generation" button in the "Create avatar" modal displays a loading animation after being clicked, indicating the avatar generation process is underway.

The video begins with a close-up view of a person's torso and arms, adorned with a brightly colored, intricate mandala-like projection. The central pattern features concentric rings of pink, orange, and yellow, surrounded by green petal-like shapes. Abstract, blurry green light effects form the background and appear to emanate from the sides. Over the first four seconds, the person's arms are observed to move subtly, shifting their position outwards and slightly away from the body, while the central projection remains consistent and vibrant.

description.text: The video begins with a close-up shot of a person's hand touching a smartphone screen resting on a wooden surface. As the sequence progresses, social media icons, including Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, and Google+, begin to appear and multiply around the phone screen, indicating interaction with or a focus on social media platforms.
